name: My Dear Frankenstein
description:
Alright, let's go. While the darkness is gentle.
“My Dear Frankenstein" is an exploratory adventure game that wanders around the city at night.
Become a newborn monster and search for lost pieces of your heart!

This game alternates between the adventure part and the exploration part.
Enjoy a variety of conversations with in adventure part and solve various mysteries in exploration part.

* This game includes expressions reminiscent of suicide and some cruel expressions.
